parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name>game1</name>=<value> arma3

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control

</value></part><part><name>descr</name>=<value> Returns the tooltip property of a button control. Getter for [[ctrlSetTooltip]].

</value></part><part><name>pr</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>s1</name>=<value> [[ctrlTooltip]] control

</value></part><part><name>r1</name>=<value> [[String]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[ctrlTooltip]] _control;</code>
